items.title: Review repository and editor loading flow for multi-document support

narrative.Background: The editor loaded only the latest draft and did not expose multi-document selection.
narrative.Problem: A dropdown-based selection workflow required understanding existing repository list/get/upsert behavior.

items.title: Implement Hoshin dropdown selector with add-new option

narrative.Background: Users needed to manage more than one Hoshin document from the same editor view.
narrative.Problem: The UI and state needed new selection and creation flows while preserving autosave.

narrative.Background: State and persistence changes can introduce regressions.
narrative.Problem: Type safety and tests had to be re-verified after the editor workflow update.
